title: There are the Best Nintendo Switch Games to play in 2022
content:
The Nintendo Switch is one of the most popular consoles of all time, and there’s very good reason for it. Thanks to its hybrid design, you can play on your TV, in handheld mode, or set the console down on a desk to play games in any way you want. It’s frankly my favorite console

The post There are the Best Nintendo Switch Games to play in 2022 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Nintendo Switch is an extraordinary console with many great games to play. But which Switch games are the best ones to play? Find out!
